name: Santa Run - tap tap tap
description:
The objective of this jumping Santa game, is to keep the jolly fellow off the frozen spikes by taping the screen.

Santa Jump is a simple game that you need to show your skills in gauging and perfect in timing. Santa need to climb up the chimney and need to avoid all the obstacle on the way.

HOW TO PLAY:
- Tab to jump
- Jump to avoid obstacle


TIPS:
- You need to be fast but don't just jump blindly
- You need to find the correct timing, don't jump to late

HAVE FUN! AND Give us good rating if you like it.
